description: Write fundamental unit for real quadratic field of discriminant n as x + y*omega; sequence gives values of y for n == 1 (mod 4).
comments: Entries are indexed by values of n from A039955.Subsequence of A077058 excluding terms for which A077425(n) is not squarefree. - _Max Alekseyev_, Dec 12 2012
references: R. A. Mollin, Quadratics, CRC Press, 1996, Tables B1-B3.
mathematica: 2*NumberFieldFundamentalUnits[ Sqrt[#] ][[1, 2, 2]] & /@ Select[ Range[5, 309, 4], SquareFreeQ ]  (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jul 09 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 06 2000
